  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BookMenuController
    This class is created to control the librarian book menu It makes it possible to view the books of library and to remove them It also provides the possibility to get to the previous window
    LibrarianController
    This class is the main librarian controller that controls many actions It makes it possible to open the librarian menu
    MemberMenuController
    It controls member menu By this we can open add member menu We can delete a member It also shows all members in the system to the librarian
